userGuideContent.introText: This guide explains the Code of Conduct (CoC) acknowledgment process for both employees and HR administrators. Please follow the steps carefully.
userGuideContent.accessingCoCText: Navigate to the CoC form page from the main portal or direct link. This is where you will view and acknowledge the Code of Conduct.
userGuideContent.altAccessCoC: Screenshot of CoC form access point
userGuideContent.viewingCoCText: The latest version of the Code of Conduct will be displayed on the page. You can scroll through the document to read it thoroughly. After that, you can proceed to acknowledge it.
userGuideContent.viewingCoCWatermark: Note: The document will have a 'Confidential Document' watermark with your employee ID for security purposes.
userGuideContent.altPdfView: Screenshot of CoC PDF view with watermark
userGuideContent.step1Title: Step 1: Print or Download the Acknowledgment Form
userGuideContent.step1Text: In the acknowledgment dialog, you will find two options:
userGuideContent.step1PrintButton: Print Button: Click this to generate a printable version of the acknowledgment form. Print this document physically and sign it.
userGuideContent.step1DownloadButton: Download Button: Click this to download the acknowledgment form. You can save it and sign it digitally using appropriate software.
userGuideContent.step1Signing: After printing and signing physically, or downloading and signing digitally, click 'Next'.
userGuideContent.step2Text: Use the file input to upload your signed document. If you signed it physically, please scan it first.
userGuideContent.altStep2Dialog: Screenshot of Acknowledgment Dialog - Step 2 (File Upload)
userGuideContent.step3Text: Once uploaded, you will see a confirmation message. Your submission is now pending HR review.
userGuideContent.altStep3Dialog: Screenshot of Acknowledgment Dialog - Step 3 (Success Message)
userGuideContent.checkingStatusText: On the CoC form page, you can see the status of your submission (e.g., 'Pending Approval', 'Approved', 'Rejected').
userGuideContent.altStatusDisplay: Screenshot of CoC form showing submission status
userGuideContent.emailNotificationsText: You will receive email notifications when your submission is approved or rejected by HR.
userGuideContent.resubmittingText: If your submission is rejected, you will receive an email. You will need to go through the acknowledgment process (Steps 1-3) again with the correct document.
userGuideContent.forAdminsSubText: (This section is relevant for users with HR Administrator privileges)
userGuideContent.accessingAdminText: HR Administrators will find links to CoC admin sections in the navigation drawer (e.g., 'CoC Versions', 'Employees List', 'Submissions History').
userGuideContent.managingVersionsText: In the 'CoC Versions' section, you can:
userGuideContent.managingVersionsAdd: Add a new CoC version by uploading a PDF and assigning a version number.
userGuideContent.altAddVersionDialog: Screenshot of Add New CoC Version dialog
userGuideContent.managingSubmissionsText: In the 'Employees List' section, you can:
userGuideContent.managingSubmissionsFilter: View the list of all employees and their CoC acknowledgment status. You can filter and search this list.
userGuideContent.managingSubmissionsReminders: Send email reminders to employees who haven't submitted their acknowledgment.
userGuideContent.managingSubmissionsReview: Review a submitted document by clicking on the view icon. The PDF will be displayed in a dialog.
userGuideContent.managingSubmissionsApprove: Approve a submission if the document is correct.
userGuideContent.managingSubmissionsReject: Reject a submission if the document is incorrect or there's an issue.
userGuideContent.altEmployeesListPage: Screenshot of Employees List page for HR Admins
userGuideContent.altReviewPdfDialog: Screenshot of HR Admin reviewing a submitted PDF
userGuideContent.viewingHistoryText: The 'Submissions History' section shows a log of all approved and rejected submissions.
userGuideContent.viewingHistoryFilter: You can filter and search this history.
userGuideContent.generatingReportsText: From the 'Employees List' page, HR Admins can generate reports (CSV, XLSX, PDF) for employees who have signed or not signed the CoC.
userGuideContent.faqQ1: Q: What if I upload the wrong document?
userGuideContent.faqA1: A: HR will reject your submission, and you will be notified to resubmit the correct one.
userGuideContent.faqQ2: Q: Can I change my acknowledgment after submission?
userGuideContent.faqA2: A: No, once submitted, you cannot change your acknowledgment. You must contact HR for any changes.
userGuideContent.faqQ3: Q: How long does it take for HR to review my submission?
userGuideContent.faqA3: A: HR will review submissions within a few business days. You will receive an email notification once reviewed.

cocForm.title: Code of Conduct
cocForm.formIntro: Kindly read through the Code of Conduct document carefully, then acknowledge that you have read and understood it.
cocForm.formWarning: This document is confidential! You are not allowed to print it, take a screenshot, or share it with anyone.
cocForm.noPermission: You don't have permission to access this page!
cocForm.acknowledgementDetails1: I, the undersigned, hereby acknowledge that I have received and reviewed the Alkholi Group’s Code of Conduct. I understand that it is my responsibility to read, understand, and comply with the guidelines set forth in the Code of Conduct while performing my duties at Alkholi Group.
cocForm.acknowledgementDetails2: I further acknowledge that failure to adhere to the Code of Conduct may result in disciplinary action in accordance with the company’s policies.
cocForm.acknowledgementDetails3: I understand that if I have any questions or require clarification regarding any part of the Code of Conduct, I am encouraged to reach out to Human Resources or my supervisor.
cocForm.showAllPagesLG: Show all pages. You can use the left/right arrow keys to navigate.

formStepper.step1msg: Click the print button below, print the document physically and sign it. Or click the download option to save it and sign it digitally, then click next.
formStepper.uploadLabel: If you have signed the document physically, please scan it, save it to your disk, and upload it here. If you have signed it digitally, please upload it here.

cocForm.alreadySigned: You have already signed this version!
cocForm.successMessage: Success! Your signed form has been uploaded.

cocVersions.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action can't be undone!
